attributes.action: make it a criminal offence to discriminate against people because of their lifestyle.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is a petition to ensure that people are able express themselves in the way that they dress, or the lifestyle that they choose without being subjected to violence and intimidation, or discriminated against by an Employer.  The United Kingdom is blessed with a full range of lifestyles without which the country would be sterile in the art and culture that makes it such a great country in which to live, and to deny people their right to freedom of expression in the way that they choose to live, is a crime against humanity, art and the culture the UK.
